s-intro:seo:h1: Freelance developer based in Barcelona. Javascript, Nuxt, Vue, React, web, unity, webgl, iOS.
s-intro:text: Yup! I’m Christian, a 28 y/o islander based in Barcelona. Nowadays busy working as Creative Developer at B-Reel, running Burundanga Studio and judging the best of digital industry at FWA.
